00040 struct Hypothesis
00041 {
00042   vector<Token> vt;
00043   vector<double> vent;
00044   vector<int> order;
00045   vector< vector<pair<string, double> > > vvp;
00046   double prob;
00047   bool operator<(const Hypothesis & h) const {
00048     return prob < h.prob;
00049   }
00050   Hypothesis(const vector<Token> & vt_,
00051              const multimap<string, string> & tagdic,
00052              const vector<ME_Model> & vme)
00053   {
00054     prob = 1.0;
00055     vt = vt_;
00056     size_t n = vt.size();
00057     vent.resize(n);
00058     vvp.resize(n);
00059     order.resize(n);
00060     for (size_t i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00061       vt[i].prd = "";
00062       Update(i, tagdic, vme);
00063     }
00064   }
00065   void Print()
00066   {
00067     for (size_t k = 0; k < vt.size(); k++) {
00068       cout << vt[k].str << "/";
00069       if (vt[k].prd == "") cout << "?";
00070       else cout << vt[k].prd;
00071       cout << " ";
00072     }
00073     cout << endl;
00074   }
00075   void Update(const int j,
00076               const multimap<string, string> & tagdic,
00077               const vector<ME_Model> & vme)
00078   {
00079     string pos_left1 = "BOS", pos_left2 = "BOS2";
00080     if (j >= 1) pos_left1 = vt[j-1].prd; // maybe bug??
00081     //    if (j >= 1 && vt[j-1] != "") pos_left1 = vt[j-1].prd; // this should be correct
00082     if (j >= 2) pos_left2 = vt[j-2].prd;
00083     string pos_right1 = "EOS", pos_right2 = "EOS2";
00084     if (j <= int(vt.size()) - 2) pos_right1 = vt[j+1].prd;
00085     if (j <= int(vt.size()) - 3) pos_right2 = vt[j+2].prd;
00086     ME_Sample mes = mesample(vt, j, pos_left2, pos_left1, pos_right1, pos_right2);
00087 
00088     vector<double> membp;
00089     const ME_Model * mep = NULL;
00090     int bits = 0;
00091     if (pos_left2  != "") bits += 8;
00092     if (pos_left1  != "") bits += 4;
00093     if (pos_right1 != "") bits += 2;
00094     if (pos_right2 != "") bits += 1;
00095     assert(bits >= 0 && bits < 16);
00096     mep = &(vme[bits]);
00097     membp = mep->classify(mes);
00098     assert(mes.label != "");
00099     vent[j] = entropy(membp);
00100     //    vent[j] = -j;
00101 
00102     vvp[j].clear();
00103     double maxp = membp[mep->get_class_id(mes.label)];
00104     //    vp[j] = mes.label;
00105     for (int i = 0; i < mep->num_classes(); i++) {
00106       double p = membp[i];
00107       if (p > maxp * BEAM_WINDOW)
00108         vvp[j].push_back(pair<string, double>(mep->get_class_label(i), p));
00109     }
00110   }
00111 };
00112 
00113 struct hashfun_str
00114 {
00115   size_t operator()(const std::string& s) const {
00116     assert(sizeof(int) == 4 && sizeof(char) == 1);
00117     const int* p = reinterpret_cast<const int*>(s.c_str());
00118     size_t v = 0;
00119     int n = s.size() / 4;
00120     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++, p++) {
00121       //      v ^= *p;
00122       v ^= *p << (4 * (i % 2)); // note) 0 <= char < 128
00123     }
00124     int m = s.size() % 4;
00125     for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
00126       v ^= s[4 * n + i] << (i * 8);
00127     }
00128     return v;
00129   }
00130 };

00147 class ParenConverter
00148 {
00149   map<string, string> ptb2pos;
00150   map<string, string> pos2ptb;
00151 public:
00152   ParenConverter() {
00153     const static char* table[] = {
00154       "-LRB-", "(",
00155       "-RRB-", ")",
00156       "-LSB-", "[",
00157       "-RSB-", "]",
00158       "-LCB-", "{",
00159       "-RCB-", "}",
00160       "***", "***",
00161     };
00162 
00163     for (int i = 0;; i++) {
00164       if (string(table[i]) == "***") break;
00165       ptb2pos.insert(make_pair(table[i], table[i+1]));
00166       pos2ptb.insert(make_pair(table[i+1], table[i]));
00167     }
00168   }
00169   string Ptb2Pos(const string & s) {
00170     map<string, string>::const_iterator i = ptb2pos.find(s);
00171     if (i == ptb2pos.end()) return s;
00172     return i->second;
00173   }
00174   string Pos2Ptb(const string & s) {
00175     map<string, string>::const_iterator i = pos2ptb.find(s);
00176     if (i == pos2ptb.end()) return s;
00177     return i->second;
00178   }
00179 };
